2.2 Investment boom:
● AI agents' mentions on corporrate earnings calls grew 4x QoQ in Q4 2024. And they are
on pace to double again this quarter.
● Funding to startups in the field of AI Agents nearly 3x in 2024.
● About 15k funded startups in the U.S. are working on AI Agents.
2.3 Enormous market potential
● By 2028, Gartner predicts that 33% of enterprise software applications will include agentic
AI, up from less than 1% in 2024, with at least 15% of day-to-day work decisions being made
autonomously through AI agents.In fact, the AI agents market is expected to see significant
growth, rising from $5.1 billion in 2024 to $47.1 billion by 2030.
● According to CB Insights, 63% of organizaitons at Q4 2024 are "placing a lot of importance" on
AI agents in the next 12 months, and all are at least experimenting with them.
3. About Manus: breakthrough of hype?
● LLMs (Claude, DS-R1, Qwen) + Tools, Functions, and
